About Me.

Web Designer & Developer

I am a 27 year old website designer/developer from Essex. I have been tinkering with the web for several years, however in the last year or so I have been dedicating all of my spare time to studying web development and UI/UX design.

My already enormous passion and enthusiasm for web development grows with each website completed and with every web language and technology that I improve.

I am always striving to improve my skills, currently I am committing my time, first and foremost, to JavaScript (including nodeJS and NPM), with the intention of learning React in the near future, while also continuing to improve my CSS and general design skills every single day.
